## rds-error-page Readme



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                     | Type     | Default |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `errorCode` | `error-code` | Renders the content of error page based on the error code also defaults to 404. | `number` | `404`   |


### Slots

| Slot          | Description                                                 |
| ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"primary"`   | used to add a primary action button or any other element.   |
| `"secondary"` | used to add a secondary action button or any other element. |


----------------------------------------------
